project.name: |-- 001-conditional-deferred-execution
project.description:
Keywords: + Functional Programming, Java 8 + Conditional Deferred Execution Pattern
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to implement conditional deferred execution using lambdas.
CustomLoggerRunner: In the example, a simple custom logger is built from scratch. It is first demonstrated that methods such as isLoggable() should not be exposed to the client code because it makes the code less readable.
Then, it is demonstrated how to perform lazy evaluation of the message by providing a log() method that accepts a lambda. This lambda is only evaluated if the log level is the appropriate one.
